metadata.title: CVE-2023-45661 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: stb_image is a single file MIT licensed library for processing images. Acrafted image file may trigger out of bounds memcpy read in`stbi__gif_load_next`. This happens because two_back points to a memoryaddress lower than the start of the buffer out. This issue may be used toleak internal memory allocation information.

criterions.comment: libstb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
